Primary Energy: Negative 2 (psychic assault through cruel words) Supporting Energy: Space 2 (medium range) Range: Medium, 60 ft. Duration: Instantaneous Total Cost: 4 Energy Action: Simple Weave (1 action) - Does NOT provoke opportunity attacks Weaving Roll: Negative Potential + Negative Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Speak cutting words at one creature you can see within medium range. Target takes [[/damage 4 type=psychic]] damage and makes [[/save type=will]]. Compare your weaving successes to their save successes. If you have more, target adds 1 to their next attack roll before end of their next turn. Saving Throw: Will (to resist psychic damage and demoralization) Damage Type: Psychic (mental) DR Interaction: Half DR ([[/damage 4 type=psychic]] damage vs DR 4 becomes 4 - 2 = [[/damage 2]] damage) Success Scaling: 0 = no damage, 1 = half damage (2), 2 = full damage (4) + penalty on attack, 3 = +[[/damage 4]] damage (8 total) + penalty on attack, 4 = +[[/damage 8]] damage (12 total) + penalty applies to all rolls until end of their next turn, 5 = +[[/damage 8]] damage (12 total) + penalty lasts 1 minute
